title: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package'
description: Bug 4971: When attempting to copy a package in jdt.ui3, the 'copy package' feature does not function as expected. The user selects a destination folder, but the behavior is strange.
OB: When attempting to copy a package, the 'copy package' feature behaves strangely. The expected destination folder 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' is not being selected.
EB: The 'copy package' feature should select the destination folder 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' as expected.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Open the 'copy package' feature in jdt.ui3.
2. Select the package you want to copy.
3. Choose the destination as 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui'.
4. Verify if the destination folder is correctly selected.
